channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: This Mini-ITX motherboard with four DDR5 slots could end up as rival to Nvidia's Petaflop AI mini PC
item.description: Maxsun’s MS-PC Farm 88601 Mini-ITX motherboard supports four DDR5 slots, PCIe 5.0 expansion, advanced power delivery, and remote management features.

item.title: 3 new features I want to see from Garmin in 2026
item.description: The new features I want to see on Garmin watches during the coming year to compete with the likes of Apple and Samsung.

item.title: Police charge driver who allegedly killed a pedestrian while livestreaming on TikTok
item.description: Local police said they have charged an Illinois driver who struck and killed a pedestrian while she was livestreaming on TikTok.

item.title: LG announces new UltraGear evo gaming monitors with AI upscaling
item.description: LG unveiled a whole new line of gaming monitors ahead of CES on Friday. The UltraGear evo line are all high-end monitors covering a range of technologies, but united by 5K resolution and AI upscaling. The three flagships under the new branding are the 39GX950B, the 27GM950B, and the 52G930B. The first number in the […]

item.title: You may soon be able to change your Gmail address
item.description: Good news for anyone tired of or embarrassed by their current Gmail address.
